minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Adding support for specifying `window.FabricConfig.fontBaseUrl` in order to customize where the font resources are pulled from. Leaving it blank will avoid fontface definitions from being registered.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Major updates to mergeStyles and other various utilities. Updating fonts to follow latest fabric-core language fallbacks.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Various casing changes for exported members. Added `mergeStyles` helper for merging style sets. Moving content around in the project.

minor.author: Srikanth Deshpande <srideshpande@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Change the build rig in @uifabric/styling to one that enables the creation of a bundle safe for consumption by SharePoint partners. This should have no effect on the output of the modules.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Adding the initial styling package. Initial checkin, not meant to be consumed until we release a 1.0.0.
